report.title: NBN Exchange format using standard filters
report.description: An extract of records in a format suitable for creating NBN Exchange format files in combination with the nbn output format. Compatible with the standard report filter parameters.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences o join occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id and occ.deleted=false -- to get sensitivity_precision join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id left join (index_locations_samples ils join locations l on l.id=ils.location_id join cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id and ctt.term='Vice County' ) on ils.sample_id=o.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.date_type in ('D','DD','O','OO','Y','YY','-Y','U') and (s.entered_sref_system ilike 'osgb' or s.entered_sref_system ilike 'osie' or s.entered_sref_system = '4326' or s.entered_sref_system = '27700') and o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key is not null #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

column.name: sensitive
column.sql: case when occ.sensitivity_precision is null then 'f' else 't' end

column.name: gridreference
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then null else replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(s.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else case length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')) when 5 then 2000 else pow(10, (12-length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')))/2) end end
